VideoCallParticipant.name: VideoCallParticipant
VideoCallParticipant.description: Represents a participant in a video call.

Email.description: The email address of the participant, from the video call provider.

IsAllowed.description: Indicates whether the participant is admitted into the video call (true) or not (false).

JoinDateTime.description: The date and time when the participant joins the video call.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LeaveDateTime.description: The date and time when the participant leaves the video call.

Name.description: The participant's name or phone number. This information is provided by the video call provider.

RelatedPersonId.description: The Salesforce ID of the user, lead, or contact record for this participant.

VideoCallId.description: The ID of the video call record.
